REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0430 reute u f BC-GUNZE-SANGYO-SETS-25 03-05 0053

TEXT.TITLE: GUNZE SANGYO SETS 25 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTES ISSUE
TEXT.BODY: Gunze Sangyo Inc of Tokyo is launching a 25 mln Swiss franc convertible notes issue due May 31, 1992 with a coupon indication of 1-5/8 pct, lead manager Swiss Volksbank said. Conditions will be set on March 11 and payment date is March 30. REUTER
